derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin pituitarius 'secreting phlegm', from pituita 'phlegm'

means.word_mean: 1. the master gland of the endocrine system; located at the base of the brain

2. having abnormal size with overgrown extremities resulting from abnormal pituitary secretion;
